water.label: Water
water.description: Water pillar of the WEFE Nexus focusing on water security, access, and sustainable management

score_formula.description: Overall water score calculated as the mean of all water indicators across access and availability categories
score_formula.formula: (sum of all water indicators) / (total number of water indicators)

access.description: Indicators measuring population access to water services and management systems

basic_drinking_water_services.name: Basic Drinking Water Services
basic_drinking_water_services.short_description: Percentage of population with access to basic drinking water services
basic_drinking_water_services.description_of_calculation: Percentage of population using at least basic drinking water services (improved water sources that are accessible on premises, available when needed, and free from faecal and priority chemical contamination)

basic_sanitation_services.name: Basic Sanitation Services
basic_sanitation_services.short_description: Percentage of population with access to basic sanitation services
basic_sanitation_services.description_of_calculation: Percentage of population using at least basic sanitation services (improved sanitation facilities that are not shared with other households)

iwrm_implementation.name: Integrated Water Resources Management Implementation
iwrm_implementation.short_description: Degree of integrated water resources management implementation
iwrm_implementation.description_of_calculation: Score based on enabling environment, institutions and participation, management instruments, and financing for integrated water resources management (IWRM)

availability.description: Indicators measuring water resource availability and sustainability

freshwater_withdrawals_percent.name: Freshwater Withdrawals
freshwater_withdrawals_percent.short_description: Percentage of renewable freshwater resources withdrawn
freshwater_withdrawals_percent.description_of_calculation: Total freshwater withdrawals (municipal, industrial and agricultural) as a percentage of total renewable freshwater resources

renewable_freshwater_per_capita.name: Renewable Freshwater Per Capita
renewable_freshwater_per_capita.short_description: Annual renewable freshwater resources per capita
renewable_freshwater_per_capita.description_of_calculation: Total renewable freshwater resources divided by population, measured annually
renewable_freshwater_per_capita.unit: cubic meters per capita per year

environmental_flow_requirements.name: Environmental Flow Requirements
environmental_flow_requirements.short_description: Percentage of water allocated for environmental flows
environmental_flow_requirements.description_of_calculation: Percentage of total water resources allocated to maintain ecosystem health and environmental services

average_precipitation.name: Average Precipitation
average_precipitation.description_of_calculation: Mean annual precipitation measured over long-term climate records

energy.label: Energy
energy.description: Energy pillar of the WEFE Nexus focusing on energy security, access, and sustainability

score_formula.description: Overall energy score calculated as the mean of all energy indicators across access and availability categories
score_formula.formula: (sum of all energy indicators) / (total number of energy indicators)

access.description: Indicators measuring population access to energy services and clean energy sources

electricity_access_percent.name: Electricity Access
electricity_access_percent.short_description: Percentage of population with access to electricity
electricity_access_percent.description_of_calculation: Percentage of population with access to electricity, including grid and off-grid connections

renewable_energy_consumption.name: Renewable Energy Consumption
renewable_energy_consumption.short_description: Percentage of total energy consumption from renewable sources
renewable_energy_consumption.description_of_calculation: Share of renewable energy in total final energy consumption, including hydro, solar, wind, biomass, and geothermal

renewable_electricity_output.name: Renewable Electricity Output
renewable_electricity_output.short_description: Percentage of electricity generated from renewable sources
renewable_electricity_output.description_of_calculation: Share of electricity generated from renewable sources as percentage of total electricity generation

co2_emissions_per_capita.name: CO2 Emissions Per Capita
co2_emissions_per_capita.short_description: Annual carbon dioxide emissions per person
co2_emissions_per_capita.description_of_calculation: Total CO2 emissions from fossil fuel combustion and cement production divided by population
co2_emissions_per_capita.unit: metric tons CO2 per capita per year

availability.description: Indicators measuring energy supply and consumption patterns

electric_power_consumption.name: Electric Power Consumption
electric_power_consumption.short_description: Annual electric power consumption per capita
electric_power_consumption.description_of_calculation: Total electricity consumption divided by population, measured annually
electric_power_consumption.unit: kilowatt hours per capita per year

energy_imports_net_percent.name: Net Energy Imports
energy_imports_net_percent.short_description: Percentage of energy use met by imports
energy_imports_net_percent.description_of_calculation: Net energy imports as percentage of energy use (negative values indicate net energy exports)

food.label: Food
food.description: Food pillar of the WEFE Nexus focusing on food security, nutrition, and agricultural sustainability

score_formula.description: Overall food score calculated as the mean of all food indicators across access and availability categories
score_formula.formula: (sum of all food indicators) / (total number of food indicators)

access.description: Indicators measuring population access to adequate nutrition and food security

undernourishment_prevalence.name: Undernourishment Prevalence
undernourishment_prevalence.short_description: Percentage of population suffering from undernourishment
undernourishment_prevalence.description_of_calculation: Percentage of population whose dietary energy consumption is less than the minimum energy requirement

children_wasting_percent.name: Children Wasting
children_wasting_percent.short_description: Percentage of children under 5 suffering from wasting
children_wasting_percent.description_of_calculation: Percentage of children under 5 years whose weight-for-height is below -2 standard deviations from median of reference population

children_stunted_percent.name: Children Stunting
children_stunted_percent.short_description: Percentage of children under 5 suffering from stunting
children_stunted_percent.description_of_calculation: Percentage of children under 5 years whose height-for-age is below -2 standard deviations from median of reference population

adult_obesity_prevalence.name: Adult Obesity Prevalence
adult_obesity_prevalence.short_description: Percentage of adult population with obesity
adult_obesity_prevalence.description_of_calculation: Percentage of adults aged 18+ with Body Mass Index (BMI) â‰¥30 kg/mÂ²

availability.description: Indicators measuring food production capacity and dietary supply adequacy

protein_supply_grams_per_capita.name: Protein Supply Per Capita
protein_supply_grams_per_capita.description_of_calculation: Average daily protein supply available for human consumption per capita

cereal_yield_kg_per_hectare.name: Cereal Yield
cereal_yield_kg_per_hectare.description_of_calculation: Cereal yield measured as kilograms harvested per hectare of harvested land for wheat, rice, maize, barley, oats, rye, millet, sorghum, buckwheat, and mixed grains

dietary_energy_supply_adequacy.name: Dietary Energy Supply Adequacy
dietary_energy_supply_adequacy.short_description: Adequacy of dietary energy supply relative to requirements
dietary_energy_supply_adequacy.description_of_calculation: Ratio of dietary energy supply to average dietary energy requirement, expressed as percentage

food_production_value_usd_per_capita.name: Food Production Value Per Capita
food_production_value_usd_per_capita.short_description: Per capita value of food production
food_production_value_usd_per_capita.description_of_calculation: Gross value of food production per capita in constant USD

ecosystems.label: Ecosystems
ecosystems.description: Ecosystems pillar of the WEFE Nexus focusing on biodiversity conservation and ecosystem services

score_formula.description: Overall ecosystems score calculated as the mean of all ecosystem indicators across biodiversity and ecosystem services categories
score_formula.formula: (sum of all ecosystem indicators) / (total number of ecosystem indicators)

biodiversity.description: Indicators measuring biodiversity conservation and species protection

protected_area_coverage.name: Protected Area Coverage
protected_area_coverage.short_description: Percentage of land area under protected status
protected_area_coverage.description_of_calculation: Percentage of total land area covered by protected areas (IUCN categories I-VI and other effective area-based conservation measures)

forest_coverage_percent.name: Forest Coverage
forest_coverage_percent.short_description: Percentage of land area covered by forests
forest_coverage_percent.description_of_calculation: Percentage of total land area covered by forest (land spanning more than 0.5 hectares with trees higher than 5 meters and canopy cover of more than 10%)

species_richness_index.name: Species Richness Index
species_richness_index.short_description: Normalized index of local species diversity
species_richness_index.description_of_calculation: Composite index measuring species richness and diversity relative to regional baseline, normalized between 0 and 1

endangered_species_count.name: Endangered Species Count
endangered_species_count.short_description: Number of endangered species in the area
endangered_species_count.description_of_calculation: Total count of species classified as endangered (IUCN Red List categories: Critically Endangered, Endangered, Vulnerable) within the area

ecosystem_services.description: Indicators measuring the provision and quality of ecosystem services

carbon_sequestration_rate.name: Carbon Sequestration Rate
carbon_sequestration_rate.short_description: Annual rate of carbon sequestration by ecosystems
carbon_sequestration_rate.description_of_calculation: Annual rate of carbon dioxide equivalent sequestered by vegetation and soils per unit area
carbon_sequestration_rate.unit: metric tons CO2 equivalent per hectare per year

soil_erosion_rate.name: Soil Erosion Rate
soil_erosion_rate.short_description: Annual rate of soil loss due to erosion
soil_erosion_rate.description_of_calculation: Annual soil loss rate due to water and wind erosion, measured as tons of soil lost per hectare per year
soil_erosion_rate.unit: metric tons per hectare per year

water_quality_index.name: Water Quality Index
water_quality_index.description_of_calculation: Composite index measuring water quality based on physical, chemical, and biological parameters, normalized between 0 and 1 (1 = excellent quality)

pollination_services_index.name: Pollination Services Index
pollination_services_index.description_of_calculation: Composite index measuring the capacity of ecosystems to provide pollination services based on pollinator abundance and diversity, normalized between 0 and 1

metadata.description: Comprehensive definitions of WEFE Nexus indicators used in Trans-Sahara Living Labs
notes: All percentage values range from 0-100 unless otherwise specified
Index values are normalized between 0 and 1 where 1 represents optimal conditions
Negative values for energy imports indicate net energy exports
Maximum values are based on realistic upper bounds observed globally
Some indicators may require local calibration based on regional conditions
score_calculation_notes: Overall pillar scores are calculated using the mean of all indicators within that pillar
Before calculating the mean, all indicators should be normalized to a 0-100 scale
Some indicators may need to be inverted (e.g., lower undernourishment is better)
Missing or invalid indicator values should be excluded from the mean calculation
